school.title: A Legacy of Excellence
school.subtitle: Located in Bbiina-Luzira, Bishop Cipriano Kihangire SSS is a Mixed Day and Boarding school committed to holistic education.
school.mission: To provide quality education that empowers students with knowledge, skills, and values for self-reliance and national development.
school.vision: To be a model school in academic excellence and moral integrity.

campusFeatures.title: Spiritual Growth
campusFeatures.desc: Rooted in Catholic values while welcoming all faiths.

campusFeatures.title: Holistic Development
campusFeatures.desc: Focus on discipline, sports, and arts.

founder.name: Bishop Cipriano Kihangire
founder.bio: A visionary leader who believed that 'Poverty and ignorance combined are a double tragedy'. His legacy lives on through the educational institutions he inspired.

patron.name: Father John Scalabrini
patron.bio: Continuing the work of Bishop Cipriano, Fr. John Scalabrini founded the Emmaus Foundation to support the school and the community.

timeline.desc: BCK SSS opens its doors to the first intake of students.
New boarding facilities and science laboratories commissioned.
The school consistently ranks in the top 10% nationally.
Celebrating 25 years of service and digital innovation.

emmaus.title: The Emmaus Foundation
emmaus.desc: The school is governed under the umbrella of the Emmaus Foundation, ensuring sustainable growth and adherence to our core values.

leadership.name: Dr. Joseph Okello
leadership.bio: Leading with over 20 years of educational experience.

leadership.name: Board of Governors
leadership.bio: A dedicated team of professionals guiding the school's strategic direction.

leadership.name: PTA Executive
leadership.bio: Bridging the gap between parents and school administration.
